snippet: The No. 15-seeded Aggies, the Western Athletic Conference champions who often dominate teams inside, will play second-seeded Kansas in a Midwest Region matchup Friday.
abstract: NCAA Tournament Notebook; New Mexico State University, with imposing front line of Tshilidzi Nephawe, Pascal Siakam and Remi Barry, poses serious threat to University of Kansas in NCAA basketball tournament round of 64.
lead_paragraph: The No. 15-seeded Aggies, the Western Athletic Conference champions who often dominate teams inside, will play second-seeded Kansas in a Midwest Region matchup Friday.

headline.main: A Hulking New Mexico State Front Line Prepares to Face Kansas
headline.print_headline: A Hulking Front Line Prepares to Face Kansas
